Job Title: Plumbing Assistant

Location: Ashland, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!

We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.

A1 Sewer & Drain, a Groundworks Company, is growing rapidly and seeks a proven Plumbing Assistant. Since 1987, we’ve consistently served the home and commercial plumbing needs of satisfied customers in Virginia Beach, Norfolk, Chesapeake, Hampton, Newport News, Williamsburg, Yorktown, Suffolk, Portsmouth, Tabb, Grafton, Smithfield, James City County, and Hampton Roads. We here at A1 Sewer & Drain are dedicated to finding a Plumbing Assistant that would be a great fit for our company, and most importantly our customers!

We are a Class A licensed contractor that holds an A+ rating by the Better Business Bureau which highlights our ability to help every customer. We go above and beyond to help our customers resolve challenges and provide full-service to both residential and commercial properties. We at A1 Sewer & Drain have a team of experienced, uniformed, well-trained professionals that take great pride in what they do. Which means that we provide a 100% guarantee on all work, unless otherwise noted with competitive rates, dependable service, and 24/7 emergency services.

We seek applicants with the ability to grow and expand our presence in Virginia.

Our Plumbing Assistant inspect company-provided calls for servicing preexisting equipment and installation of new. This is manual work assisting a Plumbing Technician in the installation, maintenance, and repair of plumbing for both residential and commercial. Work involves performance of skilled plumbing tasks in maintaining, repairing, and servicing fixtures and equipment. Routine maintenance, service, and repair work are performed independently unless a helper is needed.

What we provide for our employees:

Full-time non seasonal work. Great pay!!!Monthly Bonus Programs. Additional pay for afterhours calls. Company Uniforms. Company provided work truck. Dispatch from home every day. We provide pre-scheduled calls based on your availability. Superior training will ensure you start with immediate success. Competitive and rewarding, family-oriented culture. World-class training and support. Benefits include Medical, Dental, Optical, Long/Short Term Disability, Life insurance, 401(k) with 4% company match, and paid time off including 6 paid holidays. 

Job Responsibilities:

Travel to a customer’s home on a pre-set appointment. Build rapport with homeowners and professionally represent the Company. Exhibit clear communication skills during homeowner interactions. Must be available to work at 7am, and work until manager/dispatcher dismisses you for the day. Some weekend and evenings being on call is required. Installing our products and services under the supervision of trained professionalsInstallation, Maintenance, and repair of plumbing for both residential/commercialWeekly meeting at the shop. Be a team player who will do whatever it takes to win for you, your team and the organizationAbility to listen well and follow instructions closelyAbility to grind it out every day knowing that hard work is rewarded

What is required to join our team as a Plumbing Assistant:

Residential plumbing service and installation experience for at least 1 year. Loads and delivering materials to work sitePerforms set up and clean up tasks at the work siteStrong finger and manual dexterity for handling pipes and plumbing fixtures. Detail-oriented, organized and proficient. Willing to work in all types of weather. Knowledge of the hazards and safety precautions of the work. Must have basic tools. Valid Driver’s license and good driving record. Enters crawl spaces and other confined areasOther duties as assigned by supervisor

Physical requirements: 

Lifting heavy objects, walking and standing for long periods of time and performing strenuous physical labor under adverse field conditions. Pushing, pulling, or carrying objects; bending, stooping, kneeling, and crawling. Requires entry into some tight spaces.

Groundworks is the nation's fastest-growing foundation repair company and a recognized leader in our field. We win every day by being the best at being better. We seek only the most hard-working and dedicated people to join our team. If you are a leader, seek to grow every day both personally and professionally, and are humble, hungry and ready to grind, you are a perfect candidate for our position. Contact our recruiter now and let's start a conversation about your future with our team.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
